JQLAbertoStatus: INSERT THE DESIRED JQL FOR OPEN AND CLOSED TICKETS
JQLConcluidoStatus: INSERT THE DESIRED JQL FOR CLOSED TICKETS
StatusCustomer: INSERT THE STATUS THAT REFER TO THE CUSTOMER
StatusCompany: INSERT THE STATUS THAT REFER TO YOUR COMPANY
ColumnsToRemove: INSERT THE STATUS YOU WANT TO REMOVE FROM THE FILE
ServiceTimeStart: INSERT THE STARTING HOUR OF YOUR SERVICE TIME. EXAMPLE: 9
ServiceTimeStop: INSERT THE STARTING HOUR OF YOUR SERVICE TIME. EXAMPLE: 18
